title: Draft Lottery, Jets, Zion Williamson, Warriors, and Kevin Durant
itunes:title: Draft Lottery, Jets, Zion Williamson, Warriors, and Kevin Durant
description:
Colin recaps the NBA Draft Lottery and what F Zion Williamson should do going forward, the Golden State Warriors winning game 1 of the Western Conference Finals, F Kevin Durant not being a factor for Golden State, and the New York Jets firing their GM. Guests include Nick Wright, Stephen Jackson, Rob Parker, and Ian Begley.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
